column7: Introduction to Asian American literary studies and culture through the reading of major works of literature selected from but not limited to the following American ethnic subgroups: Chinese, Filipino, Japanese, Korean, Indian, Pakistani, and Vietnamese. Same as AAS 286. Prerequisite: Completion of the Composition I requirement.
column9: Same as AAS 286. Prerequisite: Completion of the Composition I requirement.
column10: Humanities - Lit & Arts, and Cultural Studies - US Minority course.
